meanings.definition: Of or relating to the prostate gland.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the prostatic issues were common in older men.
meanings.sent2: Regular check-ups help in detecting any prostatic abnormalities early.
meanings.sent3: The prostatic exam made him feel a bit uncomfortable, but it was necessary for his health.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to maintaining a prostatic diet was commendable.
meanings.sent5: The prostatic treatment was successful in improving his quality of life.

meanings.definition: Affecting or involving the prostate gland.
meanings.sent1: She experienced prostatic symptoms that required immediate attention.
meanings.sent2: The medication was specifically designed to target prostatic conditions.
meanings.sent3: His prostatic jokes always lightened the mood during medical discussions.
meanings.sent4: The prostatic issues seemed like a hurdle, but he faced them bravely.
meanings.sent5: The prostatic complications demanded a careful approach from the medical team.
